application_information.description: NanoTime is a simple app designed to display a large, easy-to-read digital clock in a vertical format.
application_information.about_this_app:
# NanoTime

NanoTime is a simple app designed to display a large, easy-to-read digital clock. The clock is presented in a vertical format with the hours, minutes, and seconds stacked on separate lines.

## Key Features:

- **Large Display**: The time is displayed in a large format for easy reading.

- **Vertical Format**: Hours, minutes, and seconds are stacked vertically for a unique look.

- **User-Friendly Interface**: Simple and intuitive design for all users.

For more information or support, visit the [NanoTime Help Center](https://nanotime.m10.live/help) or contact NanoTime support at [support@nanotime.m10.live](mailto:support@nanotime.m10.live).
